name: Bubble Blade
description:
Play as a saw where you eat smaller bubbles and avoid bigger bubbles. Use your progress to gain upgrades.

NEW: Update 0.9 Released! 

NEW: Updates are now weekly, coming out on Saturday night!


Patch Notes:

0.10 (NOT RELEASED YET):
-Derek the Devourer
-Golden and Diamond Bubbles (purchasable from Derek the Devourer)
-Ermy the Evil Bubble
-Bubble Machines (purchasable from Ermy the Evil Bubble)
-Carry the Cosmetic
-New Skins (purchasable from Carry the Cosmetic)
-Basic bug fixes
-And much more!

0.9:
-Sci the Scientist
-Prestige
-Increased Max Tier (purchasable from the Prestige Store)
-Increased Max Size: 5000 (purchasable from the Prestige Store)
-Increased Staring Tier (purchasable from the Prestige Store)
-Shard Store
-Basic bug fixes
-And much more!

Special Thanks to GhoststarYT for coming up with some of the ideas for the 0.9 update! Check out his youtube channel here:
